com.stormpath.sdk.api

Interface ApiKeyOptions<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Options
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApiKeyCriteria
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultApiKeyCriteria, DefaultApiKeyOptions

    public interface ApiKeyOptions<T>
extends Options
    ApiKey-specific options that may be specified when retrieving ApiKey resources.
    Since:
    1.0.RC

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T withAccount()
      Ensures that when retrieving an ApiKey, the Account's owning ApiKey.getAccount() account} is also retrieved in the same request.
      T withTenant()
      Ensures that when retrieving an ApiKey, the Account's owning ApiKey.getTenant() tenant} is also retrieved in the same request.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.stormpath.sdk.query.Options

        isEmpty

    • Method Detail

      • withTenant

        T withTenant()
        Ensures that when retrieving an ApiKey, the Account's owning ApiKey.getTenant() tenant} is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • withAccount

        T withAccount()
        Ensures that when retrieving an ApiKey, the Account's owning ApiKey.getAccount() account} is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
